title: Reviewing Skins?
body: PLEASE RIOT DO THIS. What if we could review any skin in a custom game, that would be sooo helpful, this would make us not have to look at youtube to review a skin. THIS WOULD BE AMAZING. And (not to push it too far but what if we could review champs aswell. (please comment and like to riot can see)

replies.body:
Play a champ when they come on free rotation.

As for skins look them up on youtube.
i think this would be a horrible idea, riot need money and more money. riot very profit based, please why you do this post.
Its to **review** skins,_ be able to see what they look like_ instead of looking them up on youtube
What's the PBE and skin previews?
excs mi bad englsh i mant i thnk diz wuld b a hroilb ieda, roit ned mnei and mur mnei. roit vrei porfti bsed, plz y yu du diz psot.
